page.title: 01A DAY IN THE LIFE OF .....
page.content: My name is Edward Sweatman,I get up from about 7:45 to 8:05 on a school day and go downstairs after getting dressed,and get my breakfast and have a drink.At about 8:45 Gina calls for me and we walk to school.At 9:00 Richard rings the old school bell and we go into assembly.In assembly we have one song and a story.After assembly has finished we get on with some maths and have break at 10:30 we come in again at 10:45 and work on our project until 11:55 when we get ready for lunch.Immediately after lunch we have break until 1:15 when we come in for further lessons until 2:15 when we have our afternoon break until 2:30. The last hour is taken up by story or games,we go home at 3:30,when I get home I have a drink then watch tv until six,then I have tea,at 9:30 I go bed.
